Afink to the pretty good job so far ;D

I have played this game for a long time and I honestly would suggest this game. However, this game requires bravery and strategies. If you think you can be able to withstand the jumpscares of all killers and patience of all  players personalities such as trolling or even hacking, I believe that you would love this game.

30 mins: I dont like that you have to wait a lot to play killer. Its fun tho

4,6 hrs: Okay, so I spent more time with the game and I have more expreience in it. I recommend it with friends but its great in solo too.

356 hrs: I finally know how to play

945 hrs: I hate this game, but I'm gonna keep playing just to suffer.

ВЫЖИВАЕМ И УБИВАЕМ! - РОЗЫГРЫШ ИГРЫ! - МОЙ ПЕРВЫЙ DEAD BY DAYLIGHT!

Видео обзор на YouTube канале: https://youtu.be/G4crx7nAMdw

Хола, други!

У нас на носу хэллоуин, а значит, настало время для страшного и темного! Не стал оставлять без внимания это событие и запилил тебе видос по тематике! ;)

Помимо видоса, решил порадовать тебя и подарить эту игру своему подписчику! Условия розыгрыша в конце видео и описания к нему!
活动就好好搞活动，图改这么黑玩杀手啥都看不清，真尼玛不想玩了
야 니들끼리 다 해먹어라. 늦게 사니까 끼어들기도 눈치보이고 힘드네
Игра очень интересная. Можно убить пару часиков за ней.

Even tho this game has so much bugs and sometimes it can trigger you a lot. It is really fun to play. The beHaviour did a pretty good job so far :D Original characters are amazing and licensed characters are really well made. Everyone who loves horror movies will love this game as well <3
以前一直看付导和皮痒的直播，对这个游戏很是着迷，看了好长时间了，这个月才选择了入坑，因为工作不太有时间，只能每个周日玩一下，到现在才29个小时，捂脸，还趁着这次折扣把dlc全买了，希望以后能把技术练好点，捂脸
its honestly a fun game granted with its flaws of course but i would highly recommend to others

Le faite de pouvoir jouer autant le tueur qu'un survivant, jouer avec ces amis,..

Reasons why THIS is my favourite game (It stole the Left 4 Dead series place!) Not in a aparticular order:
1 - As a Survivor: The thrills and adrenaline of sneaking and outsmarting the Killer 2 - The heartbeat and music intensifies when the killer is nearby...and also during chases! 3 - The AWSEOME feeling of accomplishment after successfully rescuing someone, or evading the killer (the killer lost track of you!), making it safely out of the Hunting grounds (escape through the gates!) 4 - Reaching raNK 1 (or as high as possible) 5 - I love it that your rank gets reset, slightly, so you can attempt once more to reach that high rank...or higher! 6 -As a killer: Get revenge on those tea-bagging survivors 7 - The developers keep adding more maps and killers and survivors and perks and add ons and scoring features. This keeps the game fresh! It never feels stale! So, there you go! :D
stop giving me the fucking farm

Muy entretenido, sobre todo los rangos verdes. Es muy original y bastante entretenido, lo malo que cuando actualizan o le meten algo nuevo casi siempre la cagan con otra cosa pero bueno le ponen solución al cabo del tiempo.

Gra warta uwagi zwłaszcza w trybie kooperacyjnym ze znajomymi. Gra jest wciągająca, zwłaszcza po odblokowaniu wszystkich (perków) na danej postaci. Moim zdaniem jedynym minusem gry jest, społeczność (szybkie rozłączanie z gry, albo długie oczekiwanie na graczy w późnych godzinach dnia). 8/10
